name: Public assistance and child welfare services administered by department
text:
PART II.  SPECIFIC PROVISIONS COVERING PUBLIC ASSISTANCE AND
CHILD WELFARE SERVICES

 § to 62  [OLD] REPEALED.  L 1975, c 145, §1(3).
     The department of human services shall administer public assistance and child welfare services in the several counties except for payments administered under the Federal Supplemental Security Income Program or its successor agency.  No person shall be denied the right to petition the department for additional assistance as established under section 346-53(e). [L 1975, c 145, pt of §1(3); am L 1980, c 120, §2; am L 1983, c 196, §1; am L 1987, c 339, §4 and c 344, §1]
Revision Note
  Section "346-53(e)" substituted for "346-53(g)".
